casebody.data:
Lillie MCLAURIN, BY AND THROUGh Michelle NEWSOME, the Administratrix of the Lillie McLaurin's Estate, Plaintiff,
v.
MEDICAL FACILITIES OF NORTH CAROLINA, INC ; and Carolina Health Care Center of Cumberland County, Limited Partnership; and Carolina Rehab Center of Cumberland, Inc., Defendants. No. COA16-1161 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: July 5, 2017

AFFIRMED.
